definition: higher education/same as 高等教育[gao1 deng3 jiao4 yu4]

sentences.english: Lastly certain countermeasures to the development of higher education service industry in Jilin Province are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对吉林省发展高教服务产业提出了对策建议。

sentences.english: The innovation-oriented education becomes the theme of the reform and development of higher education at knowledge age.
sentences.chinese: 知识经济时代，创新教育成为高教改革发展的主题。

sentences.english: The operation analysis for calculating training efficiency of an advanced trainer aircraft and other modules are described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了计算高教机训练效能的作战分析法和其他模块。

sentences.english: Fourthly, to reduce the education cost.
sentences.chinese: 降低高教自考的教育成本。

sentences.english: Only then is a diploma issued by the ministry of higher education .
sentences.chinese: 只有在那时高教部才签发学位证书。

sentences.english: Receive Challenge, Serve "Agriculture, Countryside and Peasant", Develop the Self-study Examination of High Education Steadily.
sentences.chinese: 迎接挑战，服务三农，稳步发展高教自考。

sentences.english: The Binjiang Campus of the International College is located in Binjiang Higher Education Park, close to the banks of the Qiantangjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 国际学院滨江学区座落在钱塘江畔的滨江高教园。

definition: East China Normal University/abbr. for 華東師範大學|华东师范大学[Hua2 dong1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
Beijing Normal University/abbr. for 北京師範大學|北京师范大学[Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
Jiaotong University/University of Communications/abbr. of 交通大學|交通大学[Jiao1 tong1 Da4 xue2]
East China Normal University/abbr. for 華東師範大學|华东师范大学[Hua2 dong1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2]
abbr. for 上海外國語大學|上海外国语大学[Shang4 hai3 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]
abbr. for 中國社會科學院|中国社会科学院[Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4], Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS)
attached (or affiliated) secondary (or middle) school/abbr. for 附屬中學|附属中学[fu4 shu3 zhong1 xue2]
Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan/exam board
